item.description: Tires looking grey? Get them blacked out with forever black tire gel. From 10 am till noon I'll be at a yet be determined location putting the black back for any scooter that shows up. Details and event announcement to come in the next day. Afterward a 3 hour fall carver, led by myself, discovering back roads in the New England fall sunshine. Temps are expected to be in the 60's.
item.name: Black tire event
